name: blue-flute
effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Cures sleep.

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
A glass flute that
awakens sleeping
POKéMON.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
A glass flute that
awakens sleeping
POKéMON.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
A blue glass flute that awakens
a sleeping POKéMON.
flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
A blue flute made from blown glass.
Its melody awakens a single Pokémon
from sleep.
